Modern. Fast. Secure. Green.

Servage Webhosting provides complete hosting solutions for both enterprises and personal user:

  • One free domain
  • Unlimited Bandwidth
  • Unlimited E-Mail accounts
  • Unlimited Subdomains
  • Unlimited Databases
  • free Let’s Encrypt
  • SSH Access
  • application installer for Wordpress (and many more tools)
  • 24/7 real ticket- and chat support
  • 200 GB disc space
  • climate smart server location within the European Union (Sweden)
  • much, much more

Sign up NOW for our 12 months webhosting plan and get the package for $35.88 (without VAT).

Discount Code: SERGNKGHP
Sign up page: https://store.servage.net/?ccy=USD

In case of any questions or remarks, just send an email to support@servage.net. We get back to you as soon as possible.

Terms and conditions
This discount code is valid until 2020-09-01. It applies to new customers and for the sign up period of the webhosting plan only. For renewals after the first period, the regular price, which can be found on store.servage.net, applies. The price mentioned is without VAT. The price mentioned is excluding VAT. If the new customer is subject to VAT, its local VAT will be added.
